description:
Alejandra Tinoco presents this genuine opportunity to secure the purchase of an impressive, recently renovated 4-bedroom townhouse in a highly sought-after complex in Robina.

Featuring light-filled, open-plan living and dining, this townhouse is immaculate in style and presentation and exudes a resort-style feel, within walking distance to Bond University. Offering two stories of sophisticated living that are generously proportioned and air conditioned throughout.

Downstairs boasts the 4th bedroom or second living area as well as a bathroom which offers the astute buyer many possibilities. This area would suit dual living, a teenage retreat or additional rental income as this property is adjacent to Bond University.

The gourmet kitchen is perfectly positioned within the home. Fully equipped with new appliances, loads of bench space, plenty of storage and overlooks your private fully fenced and astro-turfed yard for easy maintenance.

The bedrooms are spacious and have mirrored built-in robes and fans. The property has been freshly painted, all three bathrooms have been renovated, brand new carpets have been installed and the entire property retiled throughout.

Bond University is at your doorstep, Varsity Lakes CBD is minutes away and only a short drive to Robina Town Centre and popular Gold Coast beaches, this location is a winner.

Without a word of exaggeration, this townhouse is absolutely stunning and will tick all of your boxes.

With its own stylish character and inviting ambience, features include:

- Spacious open plan living overlooking private astro-turfed backyard
- Central gourmet kitchen with modern appliances
- 3 generous bedrooms upstairs with new carpets, built-in robes and fans
- Large master bedroom with ensuite, and balcony
- Split-System air conditioning throughout
- 3 impressive bathrooms
- Downstairs with 4th bedroom or 2nd living area with bathroom
- Potential for dual living with a downstairs bedroom and bathroom
- Recently renovated - astro-turf, freshly painted, new carpet, amazing new tiles throughout.
- Pet friendly
- Low-maintenance lifestyle
- Double Lock-up Garage plus another 2 parking spaces
- Outstanding rental returns
- Tenanted until 13/08/2023 for $725/wk

COMPLEX INCLUDES

- Impressive resort pool plus kiddies pool and spa
- BBQ Area
- Function/Community room
- 25 metre Lap pool
- Gym and Sauna
- Secure complex with on-site manager
- Low Body Corporate
